file_content.text: Sounds like lover boy's comin' back. Ain'tcha gonna welcome him home?
Soon as I find vice grips an' six feet of chain, I'm goin' after Zale. You even think about killin' him before I get there and you die, messy-like.
Big ugly man remind Blizz of big ugly men in White Maw... but bigger... uglier too.
Can't shake the feeling I've seen that ugly mug some place before.
Friendly. Better keep ahead of him.
He'll be trouble.
I'd never leave anybody alone with that creep.
She was lucky we showed up when we did. I don't want to know what that creep had in store for her.
Let's put as much distance between us and that creep as possible.
Hey, Zale! I like your plaything, maybe I'll keep 'er awhile--you ain't Zale....
Oh... big....
Maybe we should give them some privacy.
Convict. Take him?
Yikes...!
Tell me where he's hidin', or I'm gonna crush girlie here like a bug!
I'd like to know the same thing. Who's the woman?
I'm looking for Zale myself.
Zale's little girlfriend. Wanna kill 'er, but she's the only one left who can rat him out.
I'm not with Zale, so how about you settle down before anyone has to get hurt?
Easy, buddy.
Tryin' to play dumb? Cute.
What makes you think I care what happens to her?
And that's my problem how?
You tryin' to scam me? That it?
Ain't gonna work. If killin' Zale's little girlfriend don't get you talkin', bet I can come up with somethin' that will.
It's my job to track down Zale. End of story.
I'm a bounty hunter.
Bounty hunter, huh? Wait your turn.
It looks like we both want the same thing. Zale's head.
This is a misunderstanding.
Ain't nobody killin' him but me.
Give me one reason why I shouldn't paint you both all over the walls and ceiling.
I make the threats here.
Huh, you really ain't with Zale.
Lucky day, girlie. You're still the only one left to rat him out.
You can just shoot me. I'm not telling you anything.
Talk to me, or talk to the Houk. Who'd you rather find your boyfriend?
I can get Zale, or he can.
Please, don't kill him. You don't know him. He's a good guy... too good.
Cooperate and I'll get you out of this alive.
You talk, you live. Promise.
I'm not stupid. I'm dead. Zale... why'd you have to play the hero...?
I wanted to leave when the first sirens sounded. Zale insisted we stay to help evacuate if things got too bad. "Too bad"... understatement of the year.
Quit stalling. Where is he?
Spare me the sob story.
Looks like that didn't go to plan.
What happened?
The central power plant failed, and the hanger doors are closed. Even our ship can't put out enough juice to open them. We're trapped.
Shoulda run while you had the chance.
That was dumb.
No good deeds go unpunished, right? Once the central power plant failed, we were trapped like everyone else.
Your boy's not getting off this rock, got it? He was finished the minute I took the contract.
You're going to help. Period.
So decide just how bad you want the next ten minutes of your life to be. Get me?
I don't know where he is--wait! Please, I know where he was headed.
Zale stormed off after some argument with the warden--said he had "unfinished business."
He took Em-three-oh-bee to get the central power plant back online... said not to wait for him. That's all I know.
Don't let me find out you've been forgetful.
Good enough.
I can work with that. Find yourself a better hiding spot.
You're free to go.
I... I can go?
You ain't goin' nowhere, girlie. And your boy's gonna hear all about how you died--before I kill him.
Looks like he disagrees.
Oh, I guess you can't go.
Touch her and you're dead.
You wanna be next?
I said she can leave.
Touch her and you're dead.
An' I said she ain't walkin' out of here!
Last chance. Let her go.
I'm not going to ask again.
Keep arguing, I dare you.
I've got better things to do than argue with you.
Fine, if it's that big a deal.
You do that. I'm done here.
I'm goin' to that power plant soon as I'm finished here. You even think about killin' Zale before I get there and you die, messy-like.
If anyone asks--you were dead when I got here.
Better keep you quiet. [Kill]
Blizz like it if boss warn Blizz before boss do scary things.
When you take a guy down, you don't do it halfway.
Done?
Just completely pointless.
Hey! She was mine!
Get between me and Barrows and we have a problem, understand?
Stay out of my business.
I wasn't gonna risk her warning Zale.
She was a liability.
Only reason I ain't pullin' your head off is you got her talkin'.
You want Zale? Take what's left of him when I'm done. Nobody's puttin' the squeeze on that punk but me.
You're asking for a beat down.
Lucky I ain't got time to peel you outta that can.
Run, girlie--but when I find you, I'm gonna see how much you can scream before your lungs go.
